issue.message: Class referenced in the manifest, `com.scanpick.peermatee.MainActivity`, was not found in the project or the libraries
Expecting `android:screenOrientation="unspecified"` or `"fullSensor"` for this activity so the user can use the application in any orientation and provide a great experience on Chrome OS devices
This folder configuration (`v21`) is unnecessary; `minSdkVersion` is 21. Merge all the resources in this folder into `drawable`.
